July 29th, 2021

Dear Cosmonauts and friends,

You're receiving the newest Cosmos Mission Control, a curation of the weekly top trends impacting the Cosmos ecosystem. 
Cosmos Hub
Cross-chain DeFi protocol, Gravity DEX is live

On July 12th, the Cosmos governance community proposal to integrate the Gravity DEX protocol on the Cosmos Hub passed. This made it the first-ever cross-chain DeFi protocol to launch on the Hub.

To celebrate the event, Peng Zhong, CEO at Tendermint and long-time Cosmos contributor, gave a keynote to share with the community the future of DeFi on Cosmos.
Watch the keynote
Cosmos Hub
The Emeris beta launch is coming soon

Emeris (beta), by Tendermint, is the first cross-chain DeFi portal and user-interface to support the newly launched Gravity DEX protocol. 

Emeris users will be able to make cross-chain transfers, token swap & participate in liquidity pools all powered by the most secure DeFi protocol.

At beta launch, nine tokens will be supported including ATOM, REGEN, DVPN, IRIS, CRO, OSMO, ION, XPRT, and AKT.  You'll need to use the Keplr wallet in conjunction with Emeris. 

      If you’re interested in joining the Emeris community, sign-up for updates
      Emeris updates
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      Crypto.com announces a new testnet for their Ethermint-based chain

      Crypto.com, part of the Cosmos ecosystem and member of the #IBCgang, announced the launch of the Crypto.org EVM chain testnet, Cronos. The team stated that “Cronos is powered by Ethermint, which allows rapid porting of apps & smart contracts from Ethereum and EVM-compatible chains.”
      Announcement
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      Band Protocol integrates cross-chain transactions with Starport

      Last week, it was announced that the DeFi oracle, Band Protocol, used Starport, a Cosmos app to quickly build and launch a blockchain, to expand their cross-chain data feed. This oracle system of many different data sources means that the information isn’t controlled by a single entity, a decentralized oracle provides an increased level of security of information.
      Announcement
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      What is Inter-Blockchain Communication?

      Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) is a powerful protocol that allows any chain to communicate data from one to another. Cosmos community members, Charly Fei and Jack Zampolin, identified the need to share and update the larger ecosystem on IBC and its underpinning technology in a series of videos titled “IBC explained.”
      Watch here
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      Cosmos at ETHcc

      If you didn't get to make it to last week's ETHcc event in Paris, the recordings from the event are online. Cosmos community members, Regen Network and Interchain Foundation, spoke at the event. 

      👉 Watch "How the Inter-Blockchain Communication Standard Is Shaping an Interoperable Future"
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      New content: Interviews with Peng Zhong & Ethan Buchman

      The Benzinga crew interview Tendermint's CEO, Peng Zhong, on Starport, Cosmos DeFi, the upcoming Emeris launch and more. 

      📹 Watch it here 

      Cryptocito spoke with Interchain Foundation and Informal Systems' CEO, Ethan Buchman, on upcoming Cosmos Hub upgrades, his crypto story and what's coming next for Informal. 

      📹 Watch it here
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      Secret Network is joining the #IBCgang

      Recently, the Secret Network community voted to migrate their stack to the Stargate and IBC compatible version of Cosmos. We're looking forward to welcoming the team to the world of cross-chain communication soon. 

      Proposal and announcement
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      Persistence launches pStake beta

      Persistence, a long-time Cosmos community member, recently launched the liquid staking solution, pStake. The beta version of pStake is available on mainnet for testing with lots of upcoming community events to take part in. 

      Follow along at pStake
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      Terra launches DeFi platform, PRISM Protocol

      The new PRISM Protocol on Terra is a DeFi platform that allows for liquidation leverage, monetization of future staking yield, and yield curves on DeFi assets to name a few. 

      Follow PRISM Protocol for more news
      Cosmos Ecosystem
      HackJuno is coming soon

      Juno Network is an exciting community driven project using Cosmos tech: Cosmos SDK, Tendermint and CosmWasm. The Juno team are building an interoperable smart contracts platform using the aforementioned suite of tooling. Starting August 1st, the Juno community will host a hackathon to advance the project's work. 

      👉 HackJuno blog post

      See you at the next Mission Control!
